namespace Threadlink.Core.NativeSubsystems.Iris
{
    public static partial class Iris
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// AUTO-GENERATED BY THREADLINK'S CODEGEN. DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY.
        /// <para>___________________________________________________________</para>
        /// ID Markers of the events observed by <see cref="Iris"/>.
        /// The signatures of the native events must be respected across the codebase.
        /// Similarly, the User is responsible for the correctness and consistency of all user-defined event signatures.
        /// </summary>
        public enum Events : byte
        {
            OnUpdate,
            OnFixedUpdate,
            OnLateUpdate,
            OnSubsystemRegistration,
            OnPlaytimeCountTick,
            OnGamePaused,
            OnGameResumed,
            OnInputDeviceChanged,
            OnCoreDeployed,
            {User-Defined Event IDs}
        }
    }
}
